info.title: Native - Monitoring & Analytics
info.description:
Cisco IOS-XE Native Configuration - Monitor

Extracted from Cisco-IOS-XE-native YANG module.
**Category:** Monitor
**Paths:** 28

**HTTP Methods:**
- GET: Retrieve configuration
- PUT: Replace configuration
- PATCH: Merge/update configuration
- DELETE: Remove configuration

arp.description: Enable or disable handling of ARP (Address Resolution Protocol) events.

nd.description: Enable or disable Neighbor Discovery for IPv6.

error.description: This buffer stores all logs by default.

event.description: This buffer stores all logs by default.

major.description: This buffer stores all logs by default.

dump-file.description:
Name of dump file containing merged traces. Specifies the file
                 where event trace messages are written from memory on the
                 networking device. The maximum length of the filename (path and
                 filename) is 100 characters, and the path can point to flash
                 memory on the networking device or to a TFTP or FTP server.

rate-limiting.description: Rate limiting the logs. No of packets to rate limit (1 is default, no rate-limiting)

stacktrace_value.description: The number of stack frame details that are stored

sequence-number.description: Display event trace entries with sequence number

depth.description: The number of stack frame details that are stored
